title: Lee Enterprises Board Rejects Alden’s Acquisition Offer
sub_head: Newspaper publisher says board determined hedge fund’s proposal undervalues the company
body:
Lee Enterprises Inc. said its board rejected an unsolicited proposal from New York hedge fund and U.S. newspaper consolidator Alden Global Capital LLC to purchase the company for $24 a share in cash.
The local news, information, and advertising services company said Thursday its board determined that Alden’s proposal undervalues the company and isn’t in its best interest.
